LZ77

Class LZ77Compression

  • java.lang.Object
    • LZ77.LZ77Compression

  • public class LZ77Compression
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that compresses the file with LZ77 algorithm.

      • createOutput

        public java.io.FileOutputStream createOutput(java.lang.String originalFile)
                                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Method that uses original file name to make name for file and returns FileOutputStream for the output file.
        Parameters:
        originalFile - String the original file, name of the file is used to make name for new file.
        Returns:
        fos FileOutputStream used for output.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • compress

        public void compress(java.lang.String originalFile,
                     java.io.DataOutputStream dos,
                     int bufferSize)
              throws java.io.IOException
        The main main method for data compression.
        Parameters:
        originalFile - String, the file that will be compressed.
        fos - FileOutputStream. file output stream for the output.
        bufferSize - Integer, size of the buffer.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeUntilMatch

        public void writeUntilMatch(char[] buffer,
                            Match match,
                            BinaryOutput bo,
                            int bufferSize)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Writes output file until the match if there is a match. else writes all chars from buffer into file. Also updates currentLocation in compression file.
        Parameters:
        buffer - char[], contains the chars currently in buffer.
        match - Match, best match object.
        bo - BinaryOutput, binary output stream used for writing the output.
        bufferSize - Integer, fixed size of the buffer.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeCharsFromBuffer

        public void writeCharsFromBuffer(char[] buffer,
                                 int end,
                                 BinaryOutput bo)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes fixed amount of chars from buffer into file.
        Parameters:
        buffer - char[], the buffer that contains chars that will be written into file.
        end - Integer, the spot where writing stops.
        bo - BinaryOutput, binary output stream used for writing the output.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeMatch

        public void writeMatch(Match match,
                       BinaryOutput bo)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the match data into file, $ symbol is used to mark the start of match.
        Parameters:
        match - Match, best match object.
        bo - BinaryOutput, output stream used for writing the output file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeBlock

        public void writeBlock(char[] buffer,
                       Match match,
                       BinaryOutput bo)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes full buffer sized length of data into output file.
        Parameters:
        buffer - char[], the buffer of chars that will be written into file.
        match - Match, the best match object.
        bo - BinaryOutput, output stream used for writing the output file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setBestMatch

        public Match setBestMatch(int l,
                          int j,
                          int i)
        Method that sets the attributes for best match object.
        Parameters:
        l - Integer, length of the match.
        j - starting location of the 2nd String(and the match).
        i - starting location of the 1st String.
        Returns:
        bestMatch, match object that is the best match.

      • findMatchLength

        public int findMatchLength(java.lang.String current,
                           java.lang.String other,
                           char[] buffer,
                           int i,
                           int j)
        Method that is used for finding the length of a match.
        Parameters:
        current - String, the first string that should match the 2nd string.
        other - String, the second string that should match the 1st string.
        buffer - char[], contains the chars in the buffer.
        i - 1st string's starting location in the buffer.
        j - 2nd string's starting location in the buffer.
        Returns:
        l Integer, the length of the match.

      • findMatch

        public Match findMatch(char[] buffer)
        Method used for find the best match.
        Parameters:
        buffer - char[], char array from where the best match is being searched at.
        Returns:
        Match, the bestMatch object.

      • fillBuffer

        public char[] fillBuffer(char[] dataArray,
                         int bufferSize)
        Fills buffer with chars. If there less chars left in file than bufferSize, fills buffer with leftover chars.
        Parameters:
        dataArray - char Array that contains all chars from original file.
        bufferSize - Integer, prefixed size of the buffer.
        Returns:
        buffer, char Array that represents the buffer.
